body.p: Wishing to establish in connection with my office of Notary Public that of Commissioner of Deeds I would ask an appointment as such for your State Having for some years past been connected with the offices of Circuit Court Clerk and Register of Davidson County I flatter myself that with the knowledge I have of conveyanceing and transfers of every kind I can fill the office with general satisfaction
We are well acquainted with Mr Nowell and take pleasure in reccommending his application to your favorable consideration

Isham G Harris
J E R Ray

Tennessee
Comr. of Deeds
A. C. Nowell
Nashville
Issd Dec 18. 1860
